channel.title: Spectrum on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in Spectrum on Error States

item.title: 002 - Bad Gym Decision
item.description: Wifi Problem? Or did the Smart TV go into screensaver mode and accidently unlock a bunch of back-end options? Either way, looks like Gym Decision connected their window-display smart TV to the public Spectrum Wifi and never looked back. The alert has been there for four days now and it’s right next to the front door.

item.title: 001 - On Paying Your Bills
item.description: Sometimes the problem is that you’ve simply not paid the bills. #spectrum #tv
